At the beginning of your draw step, Armageddon Clock deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to each player. {4}: Remove a doom counter from Armageddon Clock. Any player may activate this ability but only during any upkeep step.
Basalt Monolith doesn't untap during your untap step. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. {3}: Untap Basalt Monolith.

As Black Vise enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, Black Vise deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in their hand minus 4.

trans-unit.resname: FBB·237 | Bottle of Suleiman | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}, Sacrifice Bottle of Suleiman: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, create a 5/5 colorless Djinn artifact creature token with flying. If you lose the flip, Bottle of Suleiman deals 5 damage to you.
Brass Man doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {1}. If you do, untap Brass Man.
{2}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

Clockwork Beast enters the battlefield with seven +1/+0 counters on it. At end of combat, if Clockwork Beast attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Beast to be greater than seven. Activate only during your upkeep.
{3}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
{3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate only during your turn.
{2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{2}, {T}: Untap target attacking creature you control. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
{2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: FBB·249 | Glasses of Urza | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}: Look at target player's hand.

trans-unit.resname: FBB·250 | Helm of Chatzuk | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.
All Swamps are 1/1 black creatures that are still lands.

trans-unit.resname: FBB·261 | Library of Leng | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size. If an effect causes you to discard a card, discard it, but you may put it on top of your library instead of into your graveyard.

trans-unit.source: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {1}: Regenerate Living Wall.

Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault. At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.
Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
{2}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.

trans-unit.resname: FBB·266 | Mishra's War Machine | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
